amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on the applicability of the Uniform Code of Military Justice to members of the reserve components of the Armed Forces on inactive-duty training overseas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2565 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2565 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12789) To express the sense of the Senate on the applicability of the Uniform Code of Military Justice to members of the reserve components of the Armed Forces on inactive-duty training overseas.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2565 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2565 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator McCain.
